# LaTeX packages required for HAFiscal
# Install these packages in your LaTeX distribution

# Core packages
lmodern
microtype
pdforhtml
scrlayer-scrpage
caption
endnotes

# Mathematics and formatting
amsmath
amssymb
amsthm
mathtools
dsfont
bbm

# Tables and figures
booktabs
multirow
subfigure
makecell
floatrow
graphicx
epstopdf

# Bibliography and citations
natbib
econark-bibfilesfind

# Document structure
appendix
geometry
setspace
enumerate
enumitem

# Special formatting
threeparttable
rotating
float
tabulary
ragged2e
placeins
pxfonts
xcolor
svg
verbatim
soul
ulem
pifont
eurosym

# Custom packages (may need manual installation)
econark
catchfile
pdfsuppressruntime
comment
